text: This is a list of retired Pacific hurricane names. Pacific hurricane names only get retired if and when they are notable enough by causing a lot of damage or killing many people. They can also be retired if and when a government or country requests the name to be retired. Below is a list of Pacific hurricane names retired; 1960s: Hazel \---- 1970s: Fico \---- 1980s: Iwa \---- 1990s: Fefa, Iniki, Ismael, Pauline, Paka \---- 2000s: Adolph, Kenna, Ioke, Alma \---- 2010s: Manuel, Odile, Patricia ==Related pages== *List of retired Atlantic hurricane names * Category:Weather lists
title: List of retired Pacific hurricane names
